Awards & Scholarships

Throughout my academic journey, I have been honored with several scholarships and awards in recognition of my academic excellence and research contributions. These achievements reflect my dedication and commitment to learning, innovation, and academic success.

2025

Universiade Scholarship

Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech) and Universiade

Awarded a scholarship of 40,000 RMB for academic excellence

2024

Guangdong Outstanding International Student Scholarship

Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech) and Guangdong Government

Awarded a scholarship of 30,000 RMB for academic excellence

2024

PhD Fully-Funded Scholarship

Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech)

Awarded a fully-funded scholarship for four years to pursue a PhD in Intelligent Manufacturing and Robotics.

2021-2024

Master's Fully-Funded Scholarship

Central South University

Received a three-year fully-funded scholarship for a Master's degree in Computer Science.

2021

Outstanding Student Award

Guilin University of Electronic Technology

Recognized as an outstanding student at the time of graduation.

2019-2021

Partial Tuition Fee Scholarship

Guilin University of Electronic Technology

Received a partial tuition fee scholarship for two consecutive years for being in the top 3 of the class during the academic years 2019-2020 and 2020-2021.
